articles.title: Boston City Council at-large race: Erin Murphy
articles.description:
"Whether it’s families priced out, seniors feeling isolated, or city workers commuting an hour each way, too many Bostonians feel like the ground keeps shifting under their feet."

The post Boston City Council at-large race: Erin Murphy appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Erin Murphy addresses housing issues affecting families and seniors in Boston's city council race.
Many city workers face long commutes of up to one hour each way.
Murphy emphasizes the need for stability as residents feel increasingly displaced.

articles.title: Let’s face it, Celtics fans: We have no idea what we’re going to get from this team on any given night
articles.description:
The Celtics now sit at 2-3, following a win against the Cleveland Cavaliers that no one expected.

The post Let’s face it, Celtics fans: We have no idea what we’re going to get from this team on any given night appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics improve to 2-3 after an unexpected win against the Cavaliers.
Team's inconsistency raises concerns among Boston fans about future performance.
Local businesses may feel impact of fluctuating fan attendance at games.
